participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Creative and easy-going, enjoys music and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: My favorite drink is iced coffee. I'm in a jazz band and play the saxophone. I vacation along Lake Michigan every summer. I have a black belt in karate. I love to eat shrimp and lobster.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, looking forward to new experiences in college.
participant_2.background: I go to a Catholic high school in New England. I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats. I have lived a very sheltered life. I am 17. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.

content.text: I'm going to college in the fall too!
Where are you going?
I'm going to a school in California.
That sounds awesome! I'm going to a school in New England.
Oh, cool! I've never been to New England before.
It's beautiful here in the fall. You should come visit me!
I will!
I'm so excited for college. I'm ready to raise hell and sew my wild oats.
That's funny, I'm actually pretty excited for college too. But I don't think I'm going to be raising hell or sewing any wild oats.
That's okay, I'll do it for both of us!
Thanks, I appreciate it.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play the saxophone. I'm in a jazz band.
That's so cool! I wish I could play an instrument.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will.
You should! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach. I live in New England, so the beach is always a good time.
Me too! I love the beach. I go to the beach every summer.
That's awesome! I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too
